summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing charges for express services provided to NYSO LLC. The invoice includes transportation charges, special handling charges, and payment instructions, with a total amount due of $11.28. It also contains shipment details including sender and recipient information.

persons.name: Jeffery Schantz
persons.context: Jeffery Schantz is listed as the sender of a package in the FedEx shipment details.

persons.name: Ed Spector
persons.context: Ed Spector is mentioned as the recipient of a package in the FedEx shipment details.

persons.name: Merrill Lynch
persons.context: Merrill Lynch is referenced in connection with the shipment details, indicating a business association.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: The package was delivered and signed for by E. Torres.

locations: 2 World Financial Center, New York, NY 10281
keyFacts: The invoice is dated February 28, 2003, with a total charge of $11.28.
The package was picked up on February 18, 2003, and delivered on February 19, 2003.
The sender is Jeffery Schantz and the recipient is Ed Spector.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge and special handling charges.
NYSO LLC is listed as the account holder for the FedEx services.
